organization_schema.name: MitthuuG
organization_schema.description: MitthuuG crafts premium til-gud bites using traditional recipes and organic ingredients. Handcrafted sesame and jaggery snacks with no refined sugar.

schema.name: Classic Til-Gud Bites
schema.description: Handcrafted til-gud bites made with roasted white sesame seeds and organic jaggery. No refined sugar, no preservatives. Rich in iron and calcium.

review.reviewBody: Absolutely love these! Perfect crunch and not overly sweet. Reminds me of my grandmother's homemade til-gud.

schema.name: MitthuuG Premium Gift Box
schema.description: Luxury gift box containing 500g of assorted handcrafted til-gud bites (Classic, Cardamom, Almond). Premium packaging with ribbon and greeting card. Perfect for festivals and corporate gifting.

additionalProperty.name: Includes
additionalProperty.value: Gift box, ribbon, greeting card, 500g assorted bites
